thread.title: Volkswagen CEO says more provisions could be needed
thread.title_full: Volkswagen CEO says more provisions could be needed | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Volkswagen CEO says more provisions could be needed
text:
WOLFSBURG, Germany Oct 21 Volkswagen may have to set aside more than the 6.5 billion euros ($7.4 billion) it has calculated so far to cover the costs of an emissions fraud if the scandal has a negative effect on car sales, its chief executive said on Wednesday.
"The 6.5 billion apply to the recall," Matthias Mueller told reporters after a tour of VW's headquarters in Wolfsburg. "I can only speculate about any further provisions. Should there be a change in sales volumes, we would react rapidly." ($1 = 0.8818 euros) (Reporting by Andreas Cremer; Writing by Georgina Prodhan ; Editing by Christoph Steitz)
